frame.name: Quantity
frame.definition: <def-root>This frame contains nouns denoting <fex name="Quantity">Quantities</fex> of a specified <fen>Entity</fen> and their numerical <fex name="Value">Values</fex>. Note that the nouns in this frame DO NOT convey a gradable amount on thier own. <ex>His heart attack was caused by a <fex name="Descriptor">high</fex> <fex name="Entity">cholesterol</fex> <fex name="Quantity"><t>level</t></fex>.</ex> <ex>His <fex name="Entity">cholesterol</fex> <fex name="Quantity">level</fex> <m>was</m> <fex name="Value">124 mg/dL</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Entity
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Entity</fen> identifies the concept or substance being quantified by a <fen>Quantity</fen>. <ex><fex name="Entity">My blood-sugar</fex> <t>level</t> is high.</ex> <ex>The patients were sorted by <t>level</t> <fex name="Entity">of radiation exposure</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Quantity
FE.definition: <def-root>Identifies the <fen>Quantity</fen>-denoting <t>target</t> word. <ex>Their <fex name="Quantity"><t>level</t></fex> of productivity decreased with each hour of overtime worked.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Value
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Value</fen> identifies the numerical amount of the <fen>Entity</fen>. <ex>He wrote me a check in the <t>amount</t> <fex name="Value">of $500</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition: <def-root>A characterization of the <fen>Quantity</fen>. <ex>He received an <fex name="Descriptor">appropriate</fex> <t>amount</t> of replies to his online survey.</ex></def-root>
